      • createAndSaveAccount

        public Account createAndSaveAccount(int ownerId,
                           int filterId)
        Creates a new Account. In order for an Account to exist, it must have an owner, and it must have a default filter. The remaining details (id and creation date) are filled in by the method. WARNING: Currently does not return an Account with a valid Account ID.
        Specified by:
        createAndSaveAccount in interface IAccountService
        Parameters:
        ownerId -
        filterId -
        Returns:
        The new Account that was created and saved to the database. null if it could not be saved.
